root: ^Here I lay, forgotten, but unafraid of what’s to come. It is in these final moments that I cherish our climb the most, my dearest friend, my Wizard Knight. Have you found a purpose other than scaling this wretched mountain? I’ve realized how exhausted I am, how faint the idea of a mountain peak has become. I understand now, after all this time, there may not be a summit, only an endless climb for lost souls like you and I… Perhaps this is our punishment. But something about this final climb without you feels different, more lonely… more peaceful. I wonder, have you sought out your true love? I recall the fire in your eyes, the bright smile upon your face as you dreamed of finding your Witch Knight, the pride in your stance as you turned away from me before the shadows consumed us. The moment I woke up alone at the base of the mountain, I became dreadfully aware of the fact that even if there is a peak, I will never reach it, but I wonder… will you? Your love is strong enough to persist, even after death, even after failure. Should the day ever come that you two are not together, I know the living will guard over the grave of the dead for eternity. I could not be more glad, even though there will be no one to guard mine. If there is a peak, my greatest companion, I will meet you there.
